title: Drawing, "Arco di Constantino [Arch of Constantine]", 1955
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and blue and grey watercolor on off-white wove notebook paper, edge perforated and torn.
inscribed: In pen and black ink, lower right: Roma 1955 / Arco di Constantino.
description: Vertical rectangle illustrating a view of the Arch of Constantine in Rome, seen turned slightly to the right, rendered semi-abstractly.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Arco di Constantino [Arch of Constantine]", 1955. Pen and black ink, brush and blue and grey watercolor on off-white wove notebook paper, edge perforated and torn.. 1960-129-4.
